goals.active: Continue the search for your imprisoned allies in Auric Basin.
goals.complete: Still reeling from Eir's death, my team went deeper into the jungle to confront Mordremoth and its hordes.

goals.active: Continue the search for your imprisoned allies.
goals.complete: I led my team into Auric Basin to advance deeper into Mordremoth's territory and continue our search for Trahearne and the surviving members of Destiny's Edge.

goals.active: Follow up on the information that has led you to Auric Basin.
goals.complete: After an exhausting chase, and with the help of a strange being named Ruka, I recovered Glint's egg. Caithe has disappeared into the jungle, hunting the corrupted creature that once was Faolain. I've heard there's a refuge built by Ruka's people, the Exalted, whose sole purpose is to protect the egg. I've decided it's worth checking the place out. These structures remind me too strongly of my vision.
